item.title: These undervalued stocks blew away the S&P 500 in 2025 — a 2026 repeat is likely
item.description: Valuation indicators now are extremely bearish for U.S. stocks. Non-U.S. stocks are a much better bet.

item.title: Over 6 million Americans on Medicare will now need to get prior authorization from AI for these 17 procedures
item.description: A six-state pilot program will target “wasteful care” under Medicare, Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services says.

item.title: Warren Buffett gifts us 5 secrets for investing success, as he hands off Berkshire’s reins this week
item.description: Three paragraphs in a 1994 letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders reveal the top reason for Buffett’s phenomenal winning record.

item.title: Tesla posts a pessimistic forecast for fourth-quarter sales
item.description: Tesla is expected to sell 1.64 million vehicles in 2025, which is fewer than the 1.79 million it sold in 2024 or they 1.8 million it sold in 2023.

item.title: This trader says AI IPOs and a falling dollar could drive the S&P 500 to 8,200 next year
item.description: Samantha LaDuc has nailed some big calls on stocks in recent years. She sees another S&P 500 high coming in 2026, but an unhappy Main Street.
